description_for_human: Access and analyze your financial transactions.
description_for_model: Plugin for accessing and analyzing user transaction data.

endpoints.description: Returns a list of transaction objects as JSON. Each object contains date, amount, name, category, and merchant_name.
Creates a new spending rule based on transaction analysis. Accepts category, limit amount, and time period.
Sets up budget alerts for spending categories. AI can create alerts when spending approaches limits.
